thread.title: Hemsworth poses with snake for first Instagram post
thread.title_full: Hemsworth poses with snake for first Instagram post

author: NewsWire
title: Hemsworth poses with snake for first Instagram post
text: 0 0 0 0 0 Los Angeles, Oct 14 (IANS) Actor Chris Hemsworth struck a pose with a snake in his backyard for his first post on Instagram. He created an account on the photo-and-video sharing site on Monday. The photograph shows half face of the Australian actor. He is seen glancing at a big snake crawling on the ground of his backyard in the background, reports aceshowbiz.com. He compared his backyard to the Jurassic Park. “Hangin’ with the locals in my backyard… the real Jurassic Park!” Hemsworth captioned it. Just 10 hours after he posted the photograph, it received over 23,000 likes. So far, the “Avengers: Age of Ultron” actor has garnered more than 248,000 followers. After the actor joined the social media, he quickly followed 16 people including his co-stars in “The Avengers”, brothers Luke Hemsworth and Liam Hemsworth, filmmaker Ron Howard, official account of “Saturday Night Live” and a fan account dedicated to his wife Elsa Pataky .
